headline.print_headline: In Ferguson, Mundane Choices Lead to Tragedy
headline.main: In Ferguson, Mundane Choices Lead to Tragedy

lead_paragraph: The two friends' morning intersected by chance in the parking lot of the Canfield Green apartment complex. Dorian Johnson had been up since 7 a.m. on this overcast August Saturday and after getting dressed, he was ready for a smoke — on any other morning a carefree ritual for easing into his day's routine in the St. Louis suburb of Ferguson.
